timeline.bodyText:
I think it's not needed to have this if/else. Integrity tests are done in the add method:
    ...
    .setBus1(bus1)
    .setConnectableBus1(connectableBus1)
    .setNode1(node1)
    ...
timeline.author: mathbagu

replies.bodyText:
To do this, i need to change interface BranchAdder setNode1 & setNode2 methods as following :
setNode1(int node1) -> setNode1(Integer node1)
setNode2(int node1) -> setNode2(Integer node1)
Otherwise a NullPointerException is raised.
